bets.question: Will Trump nominate Kevin Warsh as the next Fed chair?
bets.reasoning: Kevin Warsh at 96% for Fed chair. High confidence market. Testing system with small bet. Low risk, low return (4%) but establishes tracking.

bets.question: Will Bitcoin reach $75,000 in February?
bets.reasoning: BTC reach 75k Feb: 42.5% odds. Coinflip bet to test tracking. If BTC is currently ~70-74k, reasonable upside. Will track this against actual price movement.

bets.question: Will Bitcoin reach $150,000 in February?
bets.reasoning: BTC reach 150k in Feb: 0.2% YES. Betting NO at 99.8%. BTC would need to ~double in 2 weeks. Extremely unlikely. Safe bet, small return (~0.2%).
